backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, access control, and contact request submission and admin retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plaintext summaries of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, theming, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page title and mounting the React app.
frontend/RUN-LOCAL-AND-DEPLOY-IC.md: Guide for running the project locally and deploying it to the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all sections, navigation, and query client setup.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Renders the About section using site synopsis content.
frontend/src/components/AdminSection.tsx: Admin interface for authentication, managing contact requests, and granting admin roles.
frontend/src/components/CharactersSectio: Renders a characters grid using animeSiteConfig, conditionally showing images, metadata, bios, and extra fields.
frontend/src/components/ClansSection.tsx: Defines clan data and displays a grid of clan cards with sigils and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Implements a contact form with validation, topic selection, mutation submission, and success/error toasts.
Lists episodes from config and triggers episode selection with scroll-to-video behavior on click.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a site footer with copyright, YouTube link, and donation info.
Empty placeholder file for a gallery lightbox component.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Empty placeholder file for a gallery section component.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the hero banner with background image, title, tagline, and scroll-navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/IntroSection.tsx: Shows an intro video (embed or direct), a fallback link, and a synopsis excerpt with tagline.
frontend/src/components/RewardsSection.t: Displays a donations section promoting Cash App support.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeader.ts: Provides a styled section header component with a title and accent underline.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth section scrolling, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/VideoSection.tsx: Video player section that switches source based on selected episode and shows fallback options on load errors.
frontend/src/components/WorldbuildingSec: Displays worldbuilding info from config including clans, eye rules, power system, rank system, and Shiranagi family.
frontend/src/content/animeSiteConfig.ts: Central config containing site metadata, video settings, donation tiers, and worldbuilding data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for contact requests, admin checks, and admin role management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom theme variables for light/dark manga-inspired styling, along with global typography and scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeIntroEmbedUr: Converts YouTube and Vimeo URLs to embeddable formats and returns direct video file URLs unchanged.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls the page to a given element ID with an adjustable offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL/hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors based on CSS variables, extended utilities, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state, describing required features for adding a Clans section with lore and sigil images.
